title: Three prayers one for the morning, another for the euening: the third for a sick-man. Whereunto is annexed, a godly letter to a sicke freend: and a comfortable speech of a preacher vpon his death bedde. Anno. Dom. 1591.
author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by John Charlewood?] for Thomas Man,
